title: House7house
author: House7house
created_time: September 02, 2023, 08:21:21 AMLast edit: September 02, 2023, 08:49:12 AM by House7house
content: You as average Joe can become now like illuminati.So that's what the illuminati are about they help each other and support and always do everything what's beneficial for team and team will support you 24/7 If you have some problem you have whole team to back you up anywhere in the world whenever you go you receive help advice and support.Off course we Will not give everybody this opportunity to join we have to select we ask just few questions about you and then we will decide but most people can get to join.You pay monthly Fee 77$ we accept cryptocurrency payments because we know crypto taking over the world so fiat currencies we use If we want to buy something with food Also the Banks have liquity problems we dont trust Banks with crypto money is Under our control.We as everybody else waiting just one thing once the cash atm system Will be improved and connected with crypto so with btc and USDT we have power in our own hands.To run vip elite illuminati kind of Club we have to Understood history and finances and how the world works and respect and loyalty and that's what we do and our members will be VIP anyone try to confront our members then we all will stand up to protect our members we don't care If our members have education or skills we teach everything what's most important the respect and loyal mindset.If you join with the Club you are backed up by our team and by other MEMBERS.If you Are the Member of Club you get your Membership number each Member will reconize each by the number.You need to follow the rules you must help other members If you can and you have means to offer to them Job or housing. The general idea is to create the Club where you get help you never gona be alone with your problems.Payment, we accept crypto and USDT but only TRC20. Contract set up fee is 77$ and monthly Fee 77$. So 77+77= 154$ joining Fee. Disscount for those who pay for: 6 months Fee 300$ one year Membership Fee 777$You can earn money by invite others in you get 25% from new members instantly If they pay joining Fee 77$+77$ monthly Fee.But you need to Understood we need to do some selection of our members you need to have the right mindset to join you need to be helpful and loyal and respectful it's like mafia but we do only legit activity we invest and do all kind of legal business.Each Member Will get their unique Member number If you don't help other members you will be investigated by elite club administratsion and If we find your fault then you will kicked out from the Club but off course every case is different we don't make decisions lightly we investigate and we take in all the things before we make any decisions we want to keep our Club Strong so every Member we lose it's bad for us so our attentions are to keep our members loyal to us and we make sure they are happy with our service.

comments.author: DVlog
comments.body: Yeah, an elite club is trying to raise funds in a forum like this. I can see how elite the club is! Why the hell does someone pay 154$ to be a club member when they need to pay their hard-earned money to other members? I can not find it appealing. It's hard to earn money and you want others to join your imaginary club which will not bring any benefits to their members at all. Is that a charity club? If it is then why you introduced an MLM system to your members?

comments.author: House7house
comments.body: Quote from: DVlog on September 02, 2023, 08:30:30 AMYeah, an elite club is trying to raise funds in a forum like this. I can see how elite the club is! Why the hell does someone pay 154$ to be a club member when they need to pay their hard-earned money to other members? I can not find it appealing. It's hard to earn money and you want others to join your imaginary club which will not bring any benefits to their members at all. Is that a charity club? If it is then why you introduced an MLM system to your members? Because If you invite other people it means you do contribution for the club and you should get some reward for that action.We want to meet in luxury places so anyone whos owner of Luxury resorts like MA-R LAGOS TRump ...lol then you can join for Free.We don't have higher joining prices because many great people want to join but they don't have financial means but we know that person true wealth is not their Job or how much money they have in their pocket but the true wealth is all about their mindset.The world is unfair many great and with loyal mindset people have to work with low paying jobs they have no true friends and they cant realise their true life goals but If they join with us we make them to connect together with others brothers and sisters.And Im sure we will have some very good looking girls as our members and good looking guys so you could even find the husband for life.

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: If I was a member of Illuminati then I don't have to go to places like this just to find people pay $77/mo. that are wanting to be part of our very elite club. Isn't it that club or organization is known for wealthy people?Quote from: House7house on September 02, 2023, 08:36:35 AMBecause If you invite other people it means you do contribution for the club and you should get some reward for that action.Reward for successful invite? Referral system as it is.

Referral system as it is.You don't have to reqruit other members but you can do so and then you deserve reward for your extra efforts.We follow also to universal laws the law of attraction included.If the Membership is higher there might be problem because many people who are loyal and with great mindset can't join they just don't have financial means but it's all about your genes and DNA you might be with right mindset but you have been born in poor family or wrong envoirement so the Elite Club Will connect you to people and you access to resources.So once they join it's like "Cheat Code" or "short cut" in their lifes. once you join all you need just little money and right mindset you need to be good person with brotherood or sisterhood mentality.For example: the city Atlanta in USA once use to be poor now its booming because people started working together there is alot good music producer aswell the population there use to be poor and without resources but it's different situation there now the streets are full of nice cars and business is booming ( it's results of great mindset of great people)We the the Elite Club will work together we do business together and each member knows If he or she will be not loyal or true the Membership status will be lost it's like the ADAM and EVE was kicked out from paradise, just follow the rules be honest and loyal and you have good life. Im sure many people by now have suffering enough so they have more respect towards the better life opportunity.Every activity is over looked by Club Admin so Admin will also judge If there is issues between the members the administration of Elite Club are wise and smart they can deal with any issues and make the fair judgemnt.

comments.body: Quote from: House7house on October 18, 2022, 03:51:57 PMITS good ITS time to get rich One year later:Quote from: House7house on September 02, 2023, 08:21:21 AMYou pay monthly Fee 77$ Lol!! Disscount for those who pay for: 6 months Fee 300$ one year Membership Fee 777$You can earn money by invite others in you get 25% from new members instantly If they pay joining Fee 77$+77$ monthly Fee.This is a Ponzi scheme so it's tag worthy I guess.But seeing you already have another 2 accounts still active and 100 already tagged I wonder if it makes any sense to do so!

Also we Will have confidential secret request department* where you send out your request and once there is match you can connect other who's got the same request as you  It sounds like dream but Im sure many of you want to live life without boundaries the limitless life when every possibility could be realised.The fun Will only start once we got on board more interesting people with different jobs and occupations you could make your wildest dream into real your Brain will start produce the "happy chemical extraxts" your life become like birthday everyday.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: To me, this looks like someone who watched too much of The Da Vinci Code, and then got the idea to enter into a business venture in which he will try to establish an "elite club" in which he will charge $77 a month because that is the number that represents "divine wisdom and enlightenment." and everyone in the club will be happy and rich.I'm not going to any illuminati club, I'm going to have a good time tonight and I'll be happy to spend $77x2 on some much better things

comments.author: House7house
comments.created_time: September 02, 2023, 12:49:24 PMLast edit: September 02, 2023, 01:05:18 PM by House7house

But this one could be even better  Speciaially with our secret request message box becouse there is always in the world someone who want same things as you  you just need to find those people.We don't judge anyone we all are unique with our own ways.And this one is not about some weird occult religion it's about to connect people and help each other and make our lifes better and more interesting.  It's a order of higher powers and Im just the tool of higher powers it's not easy work to manage all that but at the end it will give great feeling.We are looking for members now who could become higher ranks aswell so to help to manage and judge over others you need to have good wisdom of life and wise person off course loyal and highly respectful and sure you can earn good income.Anyone who stay loyal and contribute to the club can reach to higher ranks aswell specially those ones who do some good things like helping out other members with something or do some good things on the name of our elite club who will undermine their own selfishness and ego sometimes and do what is good for the club.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Hey Elite Club promoter you're not welcome in this forum because we really don't welcome the ones who create their accounts with a scammers mindset. You think that members of the forum are so naive that they will pay you $77 just by reading your long explanations? No, you might be trying the law of attraction or another magic trick but you should keep in your mind that members of this forum are smart enough to notice a scam and whatever you're trying to promote is totally a scam and a Ponzi scheme. I would recommend everyone to be careful and avoid sending any money to the original poster.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: In all honesty it is seems clear to anybody reading it is a case of sarcasm rather than it being a compliment. Right now, how many members do you have registered on your club and how do you expect them to learn more about the elite club. They cannot contact you because you are not making it possible, it is almost as though that is your intention.Quote from: House7house on September 02, 2023, 06:02:25 PMQuote from: DVlog on September 02, 2023, 04:41:02 PMSo you have no website, nol office there is a telegram group coming soon and now you want people to give you 77$.
